com.opensymphony.xwork2.config

Interface ConfigurationProvider

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ContainerProvider, PackageProvider
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    BeanSelectionProvider, ServletContextAwareConfigurationProvider
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractBeanSelectionProvider, DefaultBeanSelectionProvider, DefaultPropertiesProvider, PropertiesConfigurationProvider, StrutsXmlConfigurationProvider, StubConfigurationProvider, XmlConfigurationProvider, XWorkConfigurationProvider

    public interface ConfigurationProvider
extends ContainerProvider, PackageProvider
    Interface to be implemented by all forms of XWork configuration classes.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface com.opensymphony.xwork2.config.ContainerProvider

        destroy, init, needsReload, register

      • Methods inherited from interface com.opensymphony.xwork2.config.PackageProvider

        init, loadPackages, needsReload
